definition: blackboard bulletin with short news items written on it (can usually be found in factories, schools etc)
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The postern by exquisite blackboard newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 後門邊由精緻的黑板報。

sentences.english: He is in charge of a publication in the school, and is responsible for a blackboard newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他在學校是宣傳委員，負責出每期的黑板報。
